citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
A WRITTEN PROGRAM OF VETERINARY CARE MUST BE IN PLACE AND KEPT UP TO DATE.AT THE ANIMAL
FACILITY. NO PROGRAM IS AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME. A PLAN MUST BE CRATED AND KEPT CURRENT.
CORRECT BY: JUNE 12, 2014
THIS ROUTINE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH THE LICENSEE.
END OF REPORT.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
A WRITTEN PROGRAM OF VETERINARY CARE MUST BE IN PLACE AND KEPT UP TO DATE.AT THE ANIMAL
FACILITY.  NO PROGRAM IS AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.  A PLAN MUST BE CRATED AND KEPT CURRENT.
CORRECT BY:  JUNE 12, 2014
THIS ROUTINE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH THE LICENSEE.
END OF REPORT.
